documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Optional area to include notes, instructions, version etc. and any additional metadata related to this manifest

$schema.title: Schema
$schema.description: Pointer/URL to the schema against which this document should be validated

clobber.title: Clobber
clobber.description: Tear down the artefacts before deploying. Helps with any legacy dependency issues or deleted plugin steps

solutionName.title: Solution Name
solutionName.description: Unique name of the solution to add all registered artefacts

updateAssemblyOnly.title: Update Assembly Only
updateAssemblyOnly.description: Update the plugin assembly only. Doesn't loop through registering steps and images, but completes much faster

assemblies.title: Plugin Assemblies
assemblies.description: Array of plugin assemblies to register

serviceEndpoints.title: Service Endpoints
serviceEndpoints.description: Array of service endpoints (e.g. Azure Service Bus) to register

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.description: Array of custom webhooks to register. NOT YET IMPLEMENTED

dataSources.title: Data Sources
dataSources.description: Array of custom data sources to register. NOT YET IMPLEMENTED
